project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a program that performs data analysis on a CSV file by calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for specified numerical columns.

task.name: Implement CSV file reading and data extraction
Calculate mean for specified numerical columns
Calculate median for specified numerical columns
Calculate mode for specified numerical columns
Write tests for all implemented features (mean, median, mode calculations)
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
